name: Absolute color perception
description:
Absolute color sense is a very test of color sense eye game. Among the many colors, can you tell which one is different?

Game Features:

⚪ Rich levels to challenge
⚪ Rich patterns can be challenging
⚪ simple screen, comfortable operation
⚪ Easy to use, fun and addictive

Game play:

⚪ Enter the game and select the game mode to start the game
⚪ Each level has 10 seconds to find the target
⚪ Once you find the target, click on it to move to the next level
⚪ If you can't find the target in time, you can choose to use the tip for 50 gold
⚪ infinite levels, endless possibilities
